title: Parsing HTTP Cookies in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will dive into the topic of parsing HTTP cookies in JavaScript. The purpose of this lab is to provide a hands-on experience of how to extract and organize cookie data from an HTTP header string. By the end of this lab, you will have a clear understanding of how to use the parseCookie function to create an object containing all cookie name-value pairs.

meta.title: Parsing HTTP Cookies in JavaScript | Hands-On Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to extract and organize cookie data from an HTTP header string using JavaScript. Dive into the practical implementation of the parseCookie function.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, HTTP Cookies, Parsing, Cookie Extraction, Web Development

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 在 JavaScript 中解析 HTTP Cookie
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将深入探讨在 JavaScript 中解析 HTTP cookie 的主题。本实验的目的是提供一个实践经验，让你了解如何从 HTTP 头字符串中提取和组织 cookie 数据。在本实验结束时，你将清楚地了解如何使用 parseCookie 函数来创建一个包含所有 cookie 名值对的对象。

meta.title: 在 JavaScript 中解析 HTTP Cookie | 实践教程
meta.description: 学习如何使用 JavaScript 从 HTTP 头字符串中提取和组织 cookie 数据。深入了解 parseCookie 函数的实际实现。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, HTTP Cookie, 解析, Cookie 提取, 网页开发

verify.name: 验证 Node 命令用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH 中，通过输入 'node' 并按回车键可以运行 JavaScript。
